outputs.output_descr: Strengthening the delivery of basic services does not only aid achievement of the MDGs, but also, through volunteer efforts, increases the efficiency and outreach, as well as ownership and sustainability, of government and civil society programmes. UNV's emphasis on primary health care and HIV/AIDS is critical as four of the eight MDGs focus on health. Non-formal education, such as literacy and vocational training, has been identified as one of the best tools for poverty alleviation. UNV supports literacy and basic education services through trained volunteer facilitators. UNV also helps enhance local governance to promote inclusive participation and engagement of communities in planning, implementing and monitoring local development initiatives, including delivery of basic services.

project_descr: Fully funded UN Volunteer support to UNV Programme Priority Area 2 (PPA 2) on "Delivery of Basic Services"
